title: Lost 22lp for bugsplat and team remade as I got in. counted as leaver
body: Exactly as the title says, my game had a bugsplat in load on the new client. When it finally let me in and i got my items my team remade and it counted as a leaver for me and I lost 22lp. I feel its a bit unfair to lose lp for a technical issue beyond my control.... I don't expect anything for letting you guys know but I feel its fair to point out that can happen on the new client.

replies.body:
While we can't adjust your LP, we can help you figure out why you got a bugsplat and take steps to prevent it in the future. Check out our [Bug Splat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) and you should be able to prevent any futures crashes.

Let me know if you have any questions!
Thank you for the reply :) its always wonderful to know someone reads these! I really appreciate the help.
